description: A pumpjack which extract oil from the depths of the planet. All credits go to creator nerze (nerze.dev@gmail.com). My part was only adjust to 0.17 and make it simpler.Originally made from the BinbinHfr mod : https://mods.factorio.com/mods/binbinhfr/WaterWell
